resources.string: Ɣur-k•m: yettban d yir asmel web

This link leads to a website that might be trying to steal your information, such as passwords and credit card details.

%s

For your security, do not continue.
Scheduled messages can only be modified from the Web and iOS applications currently.
Moving this message to trash will cancel its schedule.
Cannot verify address: %s. Sending might fail.
Set a password to encrypt this message for non-Proton Mail users. Learn more
Awalen uffiren ilaq ad ilin kifkif
The \"From:\" address is invalid. Please change it to a valid one
Tingalin PIN ilaq ad ilint kifkif!
Sbadu isillifen n uzuɣer akken ad tkecmeḍ ɣer tigawin i yettwaseqdacen s waṭas.
Akaram amarraw yettwafren. Ssit akken ad tbedeleḍ
Ma ur tefrineḍ ara akaram amaraw, akaram-agi amaynut ad d-yenulfu amzun d akaram n uswir afellay.
Your message can be found as a draft. Please verify that the \"From:\" email in the message is active.
Your message can be found as a draft. The subject is not valid.
Contact groups will not be imported. Please upgrade to a paid plan to enjoy premium features.
Invite your contacts to Proton Mail to enjoy seamless end-to-end encryption, or add password protection to messages you send them.
Afaylu, tabzimt d yiznan s tengalt n yini akken ad ternuḍ tabwaṭ n tnaka tudmawant ifazen.
Your encrypted email has been entirely redesigned for ease of use.
Enjoy new features like dark mode, improved notifications, an unread messages filter, and subfolders.
Lqem amaynut n Proton, ammesten yezdin
Introducing Proton’s refreshed look. Many services, one mission. Welcome to an internet where privacy is the default. Learn more
D awezɣi tulya n ugbur. Ttxil sermed Chrome
D awezɣi tulya n ugbur. Ttxil sebdded Chrome
Ur izmir ara ad d-yawi iznan
Ur izmir ara ad d-yawi talqayt iznan
Asnas-ik Proton Mail ur izmir ara ad yettwaseqdec alamma yettwaleqqem
Proton Mail ur iqqin ara akka tura, senqed https://protonstatus.com neɣ Twitter-nneɣ i waddad amiran: https://twitter.com/ProtonPrivacy
Anermis yettwasekles, ad yemtawi ticki tella tuqqna.
Imayl n unermis mačči d ameɣtu
Tuzna n yizen ur teddi ara. Iznan-ik ttawskelsen deg ukaram n irewwayen.
Ma ulac uɣilif kkes u talseḍ aseddu n \"%s\" sakin azen imayl i tikkelt-nniḍen. Izen-inek•inem yezmer ad yettwaf deg ukaram n \"Timerkasin\".
Ur izmir ara ad ilqem inermisen
Tebɣiḍ ad tekkseḍ akk iznan seg ukaram?
Izen %1$s ur yezmir ara ad yawi ugar n %2$d n tibzimin.
Amḍan afellay n ifuyla yeddan yewweḍ.
Amḍan afellay n teɣzi n ifuyla yeddan yewweḍ
Ugur di tmerna n ufaylu yettwafernen
S tidett? Ulac tuɣalin ar deffir.
Ma ulac aɣilif, rnu xarsum yiwen n unermis
Akud n tagara yezmer kan ad yettwarnu ɣef yiznan iwgelhanen. Sbadu awal uffir i yinermisen ur nelli ara di Proton Mail.
Ifuyla yeddan ɣer-sen talast n %1$s. Amḍan amatu ahat %2$s.
Ur iqqin ara, yettwarna ar udras n uragu i tuzna d-iteddun...
Sbadu awal uffis i uwgelhen n yizen-agi i yiseqdacen ur yellin ara di Proton Mail
Yir isem n uskan. \'>\' and \'<\' ur ttwasirgen ara
Tabzimt ur tettwarna ara imi isem mačči d ameɣtu.
Ma ulac aɣilif, sebded iminig akken ad tfakeḍ tigawt-agi
Ulac asnas yettwafen akken ad isefrek tigawt-agi
Ur nufi ara asnas ara isferken tigawt-agi neɣ URL d armeɣtu
Tuccḍa di tukksa n kra n yiznan. Kra n yiznan yettwakksen tetteddu tuzna-nnsen amira?!
Timerna n ufaylu yeddan ar yizen ur teddi ara
Timerna n tewlaft ur teddi ara
Awal uffir n yizen ur immid ara.
Anekcum ar umiḍan-agi yensa ɣef sebba n lexlas mazal. Ma ulac aɣilif qqen ar proton.me akken ad xelseḍ tafaturt mazal.
Ur izmir ara ad d-isider afaylu yeddan
Imaylen yellan dagi ad ten-tafeḍ deg Akk yimaylen
PIN mačči d ameɣtu, sekcem PIN s 4 n izwilen
%s yettwasider akken iwata deg umsefrak n ifuyla
%s ur yessaweḍ ara ad d-isider akken iwata
Afran n tsersart yerra-d azal arameɣtu
D awezɣi usali n tsersart tamezwert

Ad tsnekreḍ iminig web akken zd terzuḍ ɣer:

%s

Tebɣiḍ ad tkemleḍ?

resources.string: Ma yermed uɣewwaṛ-agi, asnas ad yemtawi d uqeddac deg ugilal. Ma yensa, ad nsen yilɣa push.
Ma ulac aɣilif, fren kan Inermisen n Tiliɣri idiganen
Tuffɣeḍ. Ma ulac aɣilif, qqen tikelt-nniḍen.
Yella ubeddel ur yettwaskelsen ara. Tebɣiḍ ad ten-teǧǧeḍ?
Akaram ur yettwarna imi isem mačči d ameɣtu.
Imayl-agi yettban d akken yekka-d seg tansa n Proton Mail, acu kan yussa-d si beṛṛa n unagraw ihi ur iɛedda ara asekyed n usesteb. Ahat beddlen-t neɣ win-t s tuccḍa aniɣer nniḍen!
Imayl-agi yecceḍ deg usekyed n usesteb n taɣult-is. Ahat beddlen-t neɣ wwin-t s tuccḍa aniɣer nniḍen.
Izen-agi yezmer ad yili d aneɛruḍ n ukellex. Ttxil-k senqed amazan akked ugbur iwakken ad tḥeqqqeḍ belli d izerfanen. ISSIN UGAR
Ali ar lqem s yidrimen akken ad tazneḍ neɣ ad d-remseḍ imaylen seg tansa-ik %s.
Ayagi ad isali inermisen idiganen deg ibenk-ik ɣer ukaram Proton Mail. Ad tizmireḍ ihi ad tkecmeḍ ɣer inermisen agi deg ibenkan-nniḍen s Proton Mail.
Tansa n yimayl mačči d tameɣtut i kra n inermisen-ik
Tuzna n iznan seg @pm.me d tamahilt s uxeles. Izen-inek ad itwazen seg tansa-inek tamezwart %s
Leqem γer lqem s uxeles akken ad tesbaduḍ tansa-inek tamezwart %s
Sbadu amḍan afellay n talunt n usekles Proton Mail i tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ deg ibenk-inek aziraz.
Tulya n tugniwin igebren ur teddi ara. Ttxil senqed tuqna-inek n uẓeṭṭa.
Tulya n tugniwin igebren ur teddi ara.
Tebɣiḍ ad tazneḍ s tsarut ur nettwaḍmen ara?
Tremdeḍ asenqed n tansa s tsarut ittwaḍemnen i %s, maca ulac tasarut ittwaḍemnen n uwgelhen iremden.
Tebɣiḍ ad talseḍ azmul i unermis?

Asenqed n %s yecceḍ: anermis ur yettwazmel ara akken iwata. Isefk ad tzemleḍ tikkelt-nniḍen anermis iwakken ad tazneḍ izen ɣer tansa-agi neɣ ad tẓergeḍ anermis. Ayagi daɣen yezmer ad d-iḍru ticki terriḍ-d awal n uɛeddi inek neɣ tulseḍ awennez n tsura.
Yettwaḥrez s uwgelhen ilem n unekcum
Tuzneḍ-t s yiman-ik s uwgelhen si ṭerf ar ṭerf
Yettwazen s Proton Mail s uwgelhen ilem n wadduf
Izen ittuwegelhen s PGP yekka-d seg tansa yettusneqden
Izen ittuzemlen s PGP yekka-d seg tansa yettusneqden
Izen yettwawgelhen seg yixef ɣer yixef yerna yettazmel
Izen ittwawegelhen seg tazwara ar tagara yekka-d seg tansa yettusneqden
Ittwawegelhen seg tazwara ar tagara ar tansa yettusneqden
D awezɣi tifin n uɣerwaḍ: %s yerna tettwakkes
Teḍra-d tuccḍa deg waggay n telɣut n uɣerwaḍ yerna aɣerwaḍ yettwakkes: %s
Tesremdeḍ afati n yizen, maca mačči akka iɣerwaḍen i yezemren i wayagi.
Ttxil-k rnu awal n uɛeddi n yizen i iɣerwaḍn-agi:
Ttxil-k sexsi tuzzna PGP iwakken ad tesremdeḍ afati i iɣerwaḍen-agi:
Sit akken ibɣu yili iwakken ad tazneḍ s war afati i iɣerwaḍen-agi.
Ad d-yefk talɣut ɣef waddad n usider n ufaylu yeddan
Sken-d akk tigawin i d-iteddun am usader n yizen amaynut ɣef ugdil
Sentem tuzna n uneqqis n phishing
Reporting a message as a phishing attempt will send the message to us, so we can analyze it and improve our filters. This means that we will be able to see the contents of the message in full.
Aneqqis yettwazen. Izen iruḥ ɣer yispamen.
Ur izmir ara ad yazen aneqqis
Sali aswir ar uɣawas s lexlaṣ akken ad tkecmeḍ ar timahilin-agi premium
Efk-d isem i ugraw ma ulac aɣilif
Tɛeddaḍ tilist n usekles. Ulamek ara tazneḍ neɣ ad teṭṭfeḍ imaylen. Tekki akken ad teẓreḍ ugar.
Tewwḍeḍ 100% n uḥraz i tzemreḍ. Ur tettizmireḍ ara ad tazneḍ neɣ ad teṭṭfeḍ imaylen alamma tekkseḍ kra n yimaylen neɣ txelṣeḍ ugar n uḥraz.
Tewwḍeḍ 90% n wayen i tzemreḍ ad tḥerzeḍ. Xemmem ad tserrḥeḍ i kra n tallunt neɣ ad txellṣeḍ ugar n uḥraz send ad txaṣeḍ akettur.
Akken ad ternuḍ ifuyla yeddan, ilaq ad tessirgeḍ akeccum ar tkatut n uḥraz.
Akken ad tsadreḍ ifuyla yeddan, ilaq ad tessirgeḍ akeccum ar tkatut n uḥraz.
Akken ad tketreḍ inermisen tesriḍ ad teǧǧeḍ inermisen ad d-kecmen.
In order to receive notifications from the app you need to enable permissions for notifications.
Ilɣa Push i ProtonMail ur teddun ara war aleqqem n yimeẓla Google Play.
Kkes asekkeṛ s useqdec n yisallen-ik·im n tmagit ibyumitren
Sermed aḍar n usebter n uziraz
Abeddel n uḍar n usebter n uziraz yureg anagar i yiseqdacen s lexlaṣ
Aḍar-agi n usebter yettwarna seld azmul-inek•inem
Iɣewwaren n uṭenṭen n usmekti yettwasihlen

Ilɣa ad d-uɣalen di %d n tasinin

resources.string: Ilɣa ad d-uɣalen di %1$d n isragen d %2$d n tisdatin
Asmekti arurad d uṭenṭen n usmekti remden
Asmekti arurad d uṭenṭen n usmekti nsan

When this option is enabled, message bodies will be automatically downloaded each time you receive a new email notification (this will consume more data). If this option is not enabled, message bodies will only be downloaded when you open an email. (Note: with either option, if you clear the cache or sign out, you will not be able to read message bodies while offline.)
Sken-d tugna tusliγt s wudem awurman
Turn this feature on to see the senderof the emails in the push notifications.
Err tamahilt-a ɣer usnas-ik·im s usekkeṛ awurman syen seqdec tangalt PIN neɣ s useqdec n udsil umḍin i wakken ad as-tekkseḍ asekker.

Mayella weḥlen yismal n Proton, aɣewwaṛ-a ad yeǧǧ asnas ad yeɛreḍ asiweḍ-nniḍen n uẓeṭṭa akken ad yaweḍ ɣer Proton, d ayen ara yelhun i uɛeddi n yiɣerban n tmes neɣ uguren n uẓeṭṭa. Axir ad teǧǧeḍ aɣewwaṛ-a yermed i wugar n teflest.

In case Proton sites are blocked, this setting allows the app to try alternative network routing to reach Proton, which can be useful for bypassing firewalls or network issues. We recommend keeping this setting on for greater reliability. Issin ugar
Sermed tawuri-agi i usemmed awurman n tansiwin imayl s useqdec n yinermisen n yal imiḍanen-inek•inem yeqqnen.
Uguren n tuqqna yezgan akked tifrat

No internet connection - Please make sure that your internet connection is working.

Internet Service Provider (ISP) problem - Try connecting to Proton from a different network (or use Proton VPN or Tor).

Government block - Your country may be blocking access to Proton. Try Proton VPN (or any other VPN) or Tor to access Proton.

Antivirus interference - Temporarily disable or remove your antivirus software.

Proxy/Firewall interference - Disable any proxies or firewalls, or contact your network administrator.

Proton is down - Check Proton Status for our system status.

Still can’t find a solution - Contact us directly through our support form, email (support@protonmail.zendesk.com), or Twitter.
Tuccḍa deg usekles n yizen. ɛreḍ tikelt-nniḍen.
Seld leqqem aneggaru tigawin n uwehhi beddlent. Ma tebɣiḍ, tzemreḍ ad tenterreḍ akken llant deg iɣewwaṛen.
Tasarut API i Firebase d mačči d tameɣtut. Ilɣuten push ur tteddun ara.
Yecceḍ usekles n urewway deg uẓeṭṭa i yizen: \"%s\"
Tuccḍa n ufaylu yeddan i yizen: \"%s\"
Ur izmir ara ad ildi izen-a mi ara yettwazen
Mačči d aspam (smutti ɣer tenkult n wermas)
Ur izmir ara ad d-yawi iznan-ik
Ttxil ẓuɣer d akessar akken ad talseḍ aɛraḍ
D awezd awezɣi ad temmed tigawt
Tuccḍa di tukksa n uwgelhen: tukksa n uwgelhen n yizen-a tecceḍ.
